title: Is Virtue Caught or Taught?
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
Virtues like kindness and respect are often better caught than taught. John and Danny discuss how to model important virtues for your children.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Dr. David Clarke's book "Parenting is Hard and Then You Die" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-01-05?refcd=1064101

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/is-virtue-caught-or-taught/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
